reviews.review:
传送门的设计真的说是相当的出色，通过传送门来实现空间的链接，从而延伸出了许多的玩法。如果想详细了解其程序原理，你可以在解说模式得到答案（独特的障眼法）。
但有时候会略显复杂，其中最深刻的就是传送门在斜角墙处传送子弹，需要通过使子弹碰撞另一个45°角来矫正其的运动轨道击中目标，听起来有一点晕，但玩起来更晕！传送门可以用任何角度建立于地面或天花板，使得有些时候玩家需要思考两个传送门的方向关系。还有一些时候玩家穿过传送门会来回颠倒，非常容易迷失方向。
最后！传送门与半条命的结合将会是一个非常棒的主意！（虽然Gmod里有了...）

I am WAY late to the Portal fandom, but I've known some of the meme's and lore since about 2006 thanks to an old friend of mine. I am SO glad I bought this game! It is SO much fun! I love the puzzles! They are challenging (later after the "training" puzzles) with out being too frustrating. The lore is fun, the villain is fun and the environment is fun. Its a 10/10 for me folks!
Awesome game for low end pc, im on qosmio x500 with intel core i7 Q 720 @ 1.60GHz, 16gb DDR3 SODIMM RAM & GeForce GTS 250M intergrated graphics.
클리어하고 평가 쓰는데 위에 게임소개영상이랑 내 플레이방식이랑 너무 다른데 이거 뭐냐 저렇게 하는거였냐?!
The OG puzzle game.  With a story too?!  IS there a reason you didn't already buy this?  10/10
legendary game. 10/10, in my opinion its a must have for a VALVe fan.

This game is a masterpiece and ages like wine. No matter how many years it pass, it will be as fresh as in 2007. 

Story is not really deep, at least in this game [spoiler]cause in Portal 2 the lore will be more developed [/spoiler]. Basically you play as Chell, a woman who wakes up in Aperture Science Facility, and you use the portals and Portal Gun to progress in the chambers.

Graphically game is really clean even for a 2007 game. Source engine makes the game a good atmosphere of loneliness in Aperture Science Facility, and gives chills of being watched even you see nobody around (GlaDos spies on you tho). And that clean ambience of science and laboratories matches perfectly.

Gameplay is really simple, yet hard to master. As I mentioned, you only use the Portal Gun, but the chambers get harder and harder while you have to think new strategies using physics and portals.

Game is both short and long. Story might be really short (people can finish it in less than one hour), yet getting 100% of it might need more than a replay. Plus, there are the challenge chambers ,which consist of skills (or a guide).

Price really worth it, no matter if you want to buy it on sales or at normal price.

Portal is the proof with Half Life that Valve really can create masterpieces. And if you want to play one of the best videogames ever made, Portal is for you.
I love the story and humor, levels are challenging but not overly challenging
I loved this game, still great by 2021 standart!

No tedy. Prošla jsem sice jen pár prvními levely, ale už teď cítím, že tu něco nehraje. Podezřelé zprávy se začínají objevovat na každém kroku a já tuším, že tohle nebude "jen" logická hra, ale něco mnohem, mnohem víc. 0dstrašující hlas hlavní "průvodkyně", její podivné prupovídky, kamery na každém kroku, roboti s creepy dětskými hlásky... a všudepřítomné prosklené pozorovací místnosti. Mám za sebou napnutých 109 minut a jsem opravdu, opravdu zvědavá, kam celá tahle výprava portály povede. Doporučuju jít do téhle hry bez spoilerů. Protože já upřímně v tuhle chvíli naprosto netuším, o co v příběhu jde, ale o to víc mě Portal začíná vtahovat do svých útrob.
Obviously the portal mechanic is fun to play around with but the environmental comedy/storytelling is something to be enjoyed too
Are you a gamer? Play this game.
All I have to say is.That it was worth my time and money, I highly suggest it to others. Had a spectacular experience, this game is a valve classic
a very good game which tests your ability to think outside the box. its like an  excercise for the brain

Portal is fun, interactive, enjoyable and tests your mental capacity. It's great, i loved it, and i would play it 20 times over. Again, and again.

Also note that only 10 people worked on this! So its even more impressive.

本作拥有出色的空间感，是一款极具创意的游戏，即便放在今天也毫不落伍，无愧于一代神作！！！

Portal is best enjoyed when you're doing a blind playthrough with no distractions or other people around you. The gimmick is genius, the puzzles are well-balanced, the atmosphere is eerie and lifelike, the soundtrack sends chills down your spine, and the story is minimalistic yet deep. 
The only gripe I have with the game, like many others, is the length. I completed the entire game plus the advanced stages and challenges in four hours, and there's not a lot of replayability to make up for that. Other than that, Portal is an absolute masterpiece.
horrible game hate it would not recommend it

Mano, mano, mano. QUE JOGO PERFEITO, sério, é muito fácil de jogar e te prende bem rápido, é um jogo q não pesa então bem raramente dá aquela travadinha, mas a história é cativante, apesar de ser bem confusa no começo, a estética de um centro de testes é muito bem representada, e gráficos bonitos e muito bem feitos pra época que foi lançado, eu me diverti bastante jogando portal, se você jogar de madrugada (como eu faço), tome cuidado porque facilmente pode te deixar com um pouquinho de medo, principalmente aquela vozinha do djanho que me deixou com um pouco de cagaço, foi um dinheiro bem gasto e com certeza recomendo, e lembre-se THE CAKE IS A LIE.
Would recommend to anyone who likes puzzles and platforming.
man this game is just amazing
Speedy things go in, speedy things come out
nice game for a game made by a bunch of dumb students.

A classic among pc gaming. Valve's own take on a puzzle platformer is a damn good one. The portal mechanic is so simple yet so versatile and open to ideas. The game does some wild things with it but it still feels like there's room for so much more (so ofc they made a sequel). Really a must buy for anyone with a gaming pc!
